title: Abuse preventative: Stiffer penalties would curb harm to animals
text:
Published By: Pittsburgh Post: Opinion - Today 
Typically an outpouring of sympathy and support occurs any time a helpless animal is injured or killed by a cruel human, but one form of ass...
